name: dream-ball
effect:
Can only be used in Entree Forest, to catch Pokémon encountered in the Dream World.

Used in battle
:   Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.
short_effect: Catches Pokémon found in the Dream World.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A special Poké Ball that appears out of
nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest.
It can catch any Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A special Poké Ball that appears out of
nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest.
It can catch any Pokémon.

Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest.
It can catch any Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to
catch wild Pokémon while they’re asleep.
